item.title: ChatGPT Shell Script
item.description: Take your productivity to the next level with ch, the POSIX-compliant shell script: Access ChatGPT from your terminal, no more context switching to browser tabs. Save money: the typical monthly cost of ChatGPT API is much lower than the fixed fee for web access.ยน Program ChatGPT with standard shell tools like pipes, redirects and grep. No more copy and paste! Buy now for 0.0008 BTC: .btcpay-form { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .
